mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Chadwick, D. H. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Chadwick, D. H.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 3rd 1862. By Telegraph from Philadelphia 3 1862. I am here to buy Goods will it be safe to take them to Morgantown Please answer respectfully DH Chadwick St. Lawrence Hotel 18G51pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Chadwick, D. H.
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
